header.class: h-16 bg-white bg-opacity-75 backdrop-blur sticky top-0 z-40 w-screen inset-0 border-b border-gray-200

b:section.class: w-11/12 md:w-10/12 mx-auto flex flex-row content-center items-center space-x-4 content-stretch justify-between h-full

b:include.data: { image: data:image, altText: data:blog.title.escaped, originalWidth: data:width, originalHeight: data:height }
b:include.name: responsiveImage

div.class: flex flex-row space-x-6 text-base font-medium list-none

a.class: hover:text-blue-500 inline-flex items-center flex-row items-center space-x-1.5

b:widget-settings.b:widget-setting: Home

b:class.name: md:hidden hidden bg-white bg-opacity-75 backdrop-blur top-16 flex flex-col text-center space-y-6 h-full w-full pt-8 px-14 sm:px-32 fixed z-50 text-xl font-medium menu-res

a.class: hover:text-blue-500 inline-flex items-center flex-row items-center space-x-1.5

div.expr:class: data:view.isSingleItem? "container px-0 lg:px-6 lg:max-w-7xl mx-auto grid grid-cols-4 md:grid-cols-12 my-4 mb:my-8 lg:my-16" : "container mx-auto px-4 lg:max-w-7xl mt-16"

b:class.name: grid grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-3 md:grid-cols-2 py-2 sm:grid-cols-1 gap-4

b:with.value: "window.prompt(\"Copy to clipboard: Ctrl+C, Enter\", \"" + data:originalUrl + "\"); return false;"

a.class: p-1 px-1 rounded-md text-xs font-medium bg-sky-100 dark:bg-sky-700 dark:hover:bg-sky-600/25 hover:bg-sky-600/25
a.title: Post Tag

b:class.name: index-post bg-white dark:bg-slate-800 shadow-lg rounded-lg hover:shadow-xl

item-post p-4 md:p-6 lg:p-8 xl:p-16 bg-white dark:bg-slate-800 rounded-xl prose max-w-none lg:prose-xl prose-p:text-justify prose-slate dark:prose-invert prose-headings:font-sans prose-headings:tracking-tight prose-p:font-serif prose-ol:font-serif prose-ul:font-serif prose-ul:text-justify prose-ol:text-justify prose-pre:dark:border prose-pre:dark:border-slate-700

a.class: read-more inline-block bg-gray-200 hover:bg-blue-200 rounded-full px-3 py-1 text-sm font-semibold text-gray-700 mr-2 mb-2

a.onclick: window.open(this.href, 'windowName', 'width=550, height=650, left=24, top=24, scrollbars, resizable'); return false;
window.open(this.href, 'windowName', 'width=550, height=450, left=24, top=24, scrollbars, resizable'); return false;
window.open(this.href, 'windowName', 'width=735, height=750, left=24, top=24, scrollbars, resizable'); return false;
window.open(this.href, 'windowName', 'width=400, height=500, left=24, top=24, scrollbars, resizable'); return false;
window.open(this.href, 'windowName', 'width=550, height=650, left=24, top=24, scrollbars, resizable'); return false;
window.open(this.href, 'windowName', 'width=900, height=550, left=24, top=24, scrollbars, resizable'); return false;
window.open(this.href, 'windowName', 'width=500, height=400, left=24, top=24, scrollbars, resizable'); return false;

h2.class: post-title text-gray-900 dark:text-gray-100 hover:text-blue-500 dark:hover:underline text-lg font-bold mb-2

h1.class: post-title text-3xl md:text-4xl lg:text-5xl font-black mb-4 leading-tight tracking-tight

aside.class: px-4 md:px-8 md:pl-4 md:pr-0 lg:pl-8 lg:pr-0 mt-8 md:mt-0 col-span-4 md:col-span-4

h4.class: text-2xl font-bold p-4 tracking-tight border-b dark:border-slate-700
text-2xl font-bold p-4 tracking-tight border-b dark:border-slate-700

li.class: px-4 py-1 rounded-md line-clamp-2 cols-2 bg-slate-100 hover:bg-sky-600 hover:text-white

a.class: label-name text-lg font-semibold tracking-tight line-clamp-2 leading-tight
